data.title: Review of Samer Soreshow Yohanna, The Gospel of Mark in the Syriac Harklean Version: An Edition Based upon the Earliest Witnesses
data.abstractNote: In the 20th century the French National Library purchased new Arabic manuscripts of both Christian and Muslim provenance. As yet, most of them are not described in details, but we have only an Index published in 1987 by Sauvan, Balty-Guesdon, Tamari. Here one can find the main contents of the 19th century
